span.strong: Welcome to Westmorland Union Elementary School District

span.br: Our purpose is to provide students with meaningful learning experiences in a safe, caring environment, assuring equal access to the core curriculum while providing differentiated instruction based upon research and data that will lead all students to mastery of grade-level content standards.
